reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and soft, with good color that can be dressed up or down, and appreciate its versatility for both casual days and chilly trips. Moreover, the fit is great, and the length is perfect for many customers. However, the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's very thin, and opinions about the quality are divided between those who find it nice and those who consider it low quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, soft material, looks classy
items.body: So pretty! I love the seams and the material is SO soft, it reached my ankles and I’m 5’5. However, there is a lot of stretch in the material so it shows every lump and bump. I will be wearing a body shaper or full slip under this. The sleeves were a little long but I always have that problem. Manufacturer, please make this dress with 3/4 sleeves! My favorite thing about it is the high neck, I struggle to find comfortable well made dresses that don’t have a gaping wide low cut neck, just because I am chunky it doesn’t mean my head is three feet in diameter, I don’t need that big of a hole to get my head through! I will definitely be buying the other colors of this. Love it. Read more
items.author: Susie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Looks great. Very stretchy but snags too easily. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortabl
items.body: Super comfortable and really cute! The fit is perfect — flattering without being too tight. The material feels soft and cozy, and the flared style gives it such a nice shape. Great dress for both casual days and going out!” Read more
items.author: Manpreet

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality fit material
items.body: Well made but material get all over everything and leave lint. Not as thick as I would have liked it to be. Size was ok. Read more
items.author: Dean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: For reference, I am 5’9”, size 6 (small or medium in most things I order), 143lbs, and I have an athletic/petite frame. My inseam is 35 inches, so yes, I have longer legs than most. That said, this dress did not disappoint! I dropped everything as soon as it was delivered and tried it on. The material is so soft, the sleeve length is perfect, the length is perfect where I can wear nice dress boots with heels and you can see those. I would say the dress comes down to my shins is exactly what I wanted! I ordered the brown dress and the black one which is due to arrive at a later date. The material, while soft, is strong, it is firm fitting, made of good quality, and can be dressed up or dressed down depending on your personal style and event you’re going to. It can be dressed up with nice jewelry or kept more simple and the dress is a statement in itself. I am so happy I made this purchase! Read more
items.author: Janee R. Walker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it.
items.body: The material wasn't what I was expecting but I like it. It's nice and stretchy but is nice and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars it's going back- pockets make an ugly bulge in exactly the wrong place
items.body: I really wanted to like this dress. The color was perfect. The fit was good for me. What made me send it back, though, was the bulge from the pockets. It's a knit dress with fairly thin material that clings to you - but it wasn't too tight and would have been nice except there was no way to avoid the bulge from the (empty) pockets which were right at the lower hip. Very unsightly! Other comments- I suspect those who commented in other reviews that the material is poor quality and not sturdy might be right, but I didn't keep it. Also, the name is a bit wrong- it's a long sleeve knit dress, not really a sweater dress at least in the way I think of sweater dresses. Read more
items.author: expatinnica

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: I like it. Pretty color and style. Fabric is a bit thinner than I expected, but satisfied with it for the money. Read more
items.author: Julie Blalock

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Khaki, Dark Royal Blue, Dusty Pink, Light Gray, Moss Green, Black, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Denim Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
